properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM MULTIPLE VESSELS
WITHIN 50 MILES OF 33-53N 012-36E. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
